nodes.text: The Froz 350 complete gear set was a suit of adverse environment gear available following the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire. The gear set was produced by the Pretormin Environmental company and sold for 500.
The Froz 350 complete gear set was first mentioned in the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2013.
